title: EDBSCAN
text: Enforced Density-Based Spatial Clustering of Applications with Noise..

title: Few-Shot Face Classification
text: Library to recognise and classify faces.

title: NumberBatchWrapper
text: Wrapper around the ConceptNet Number Batch library to improve inference performance.

title: SemiSupervisedClustering
text: Cluster context-less embedded language data in a semi-supervised manner.

title: BlenderCNN
text: Examplementory repository to show both the potential and usage of Blender to generate data for Deep Learning projects.

title: PySnake
text: Game of Snake implemented in Python controlled by a Deep Reinforcement Learning model.

title: Evolvable Recurrent Neural Network
text: Evolving Recurrent Neural Networks via the NeuroEvolution of Augmenting Topologies (NEAT) algorithm. This project performs the experiments I performed for my Master's thesis: An Empirical Investigation of Using Gated Recurrent Units in Evolved Robotic Controllers.

title: TransPoemer
text: Transforming regular text into a poem (limerick) by means of a Transformer neural network. This was one of my earlier Deep Learning projects and first contact witht the Transformer architecture.

title: Robot Simulator 2D
text: Custom low-level robot simulator, which evaluates evolved Recurrent Neural Networks (RNN) in a room-like maze environment. This repository was the initial repo of my Master's thesis (EvolvableRNN) but became deprecated with a change in focus.

title: Traveling Salesman Problem
text: Toolbox to evolve solutions via a Genetic Algorithm for the Traveling Salesman Problem, implemented in MatLab. This was the biggest project I've done in Matlab.

title: Transfer Learning in Keras
text: A walk-through / tutorial on Transfer Learning, using the Keras framework. This project was my first experience with the concept of Transfer Learning and Convolutional Neural Networks.

title: Gif-Creator
text: A short code snippet that creates GIFs by concatenating images using Python's Pillow library. I created this project to help with the visualisations of the "Transfer Learning in Keras" project.

title: Toledo Lecture Downloader
text: A script to download web-videos by intervening the HTTP calls and storing the video-snippets locally.

title: Chess-Bot
text: In this project, a Python bot is created that can play chess using the pyautogui and cv2 libraries. The algorithm behind the chessbot is the minimax-algorithm.

title: Drone Simulation - Part 4
text: A simulation of multiple drones that fly in a three dimensional virtual testbed. The main object of the drones is to bring packages from one airport to another as fast as possible, which implies that they have to communicate with one another to successfully solve this task. There are multiple airports and drones within the virtual testbed. This project was my Bachelor's thesis, which led to a perfect score (100%).

title: Drone Simulation - Part 3
text: A simulation of multiple drones that fly in a three dimensional virtual testbed. This (intermediary) project demonstrates a worst case scenario of the "Drone Simulation - Part 4" project where all 18 of the drones have to deliver to the same airport simultaneously.

title: Drone Simulation - Part 2
text: A simulation of a single drone that flies in a three dimensional virtual testbed. This project has the same goal as "Drone Simulation - Part 1" but solved it via a better implementation and resulted in a significantly better performance, which enabled the use of multiple drones simultaneously as done in "Drone Simulation - Part 3".

title: Drone Simulation - Part 1
text: A simulation of a single drone that flies in a three dimensional virtual testbed. An array of unit cubes are loaded inside the virtual testbed, where the objective of the drone is to collect all cubes as fast as possible (no order specified).

title: Asteroids
text: A custom implementation of the game "Asteroids". This project consists out of two game-modes: one where you have to fight enemies and one where you have to destroy all asteroids. This was my first Java project.
